Package nl.uu.cs.aplib.agents

Class State

java.lang.Object
nl.uu.cs.aplib.mainConcepts.SimpleState
nl.uu.cs.aplib.agents.State
Direct Known Subclasses:
W3DAgentState
public class State extends SimpleState
An extension of SimpleState that also has a Messenger and possibility to attach a Prolog engine. Through the Messenger, an agent that owns this state can send and receive messages to/from other agents. If a Prolog engine is attaches, an agent can add facts and rules to it to do reasoning.
Author:
Wish

  • Method Details

    • messenger

      public Messenger messenger()
      Return the messenger associated to this state.

    • attachProlog

      public State attachProlog()
      Create a Prolog engine and attach it to this state. An agent can add facts and rules to this engine, and then use it to do inference.

    • prolog

      public PrologReasoner prolog()
      Obtain the prolog-engine attached to this state (if there is one attached, else you get null).
